Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
Damage = 10
local SlashSound = Instance.new("Sound") SlashSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\Handleslash.wav" SlashSound.Parent = Handle SlashSound.Volume = 1 local UnsheathSound = Instance.new("Sound") UnsheathSound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds\\unsheath.wav" UnsheathSound.Parent = Handle UnsheathSound.Volume = 1
function TagHumanoid(Humanoid, Player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Value = Player Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Parent = Humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(Humanoid) if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then for i, v in pairs(Humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end end
Handle.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character = Hit.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if Humanoid and Humanoid ~= humanoid and humanoid and Humanoid.Health > 0 and humanoid.Health > 0 then local Right_Arm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if Right_Arm then local Joint = Right_Arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (Joint and (Joint.Part0 == Handle or Joint.Part1 == Handle)) then humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) wait(1) UntagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end end end)
Tool.Equipped:connect(function(Mouse) UnsheathSound:Play() Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Character or not Humanoid or not Player then return end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if Tool.Enabled then SlashSound:Play() end end) end)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
SpecialReady = true SpecialCoolDown = 10
Pies = { {MeshId = 18417911, TextureId = 18417918, Name = "ApplePie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.35, 0.35, 0.35), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi,0)}, {MeshId = 40312463, TextureId = 40311968, Name = "CherryPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.9, 0.9, 0.9), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0)}, {MeshId = 40312463, TextureId = 40311869, Name = "BlueberryPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.9, 0.9, 0.9), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0)}, {MeshId = 143518445, TextureId = 143499030, Name = "CherryPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.35, 0.5), Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.25, 1), Angle = CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), -(math.pi / 2))}, {MeshId = 65950268, TextureId = 65950352, Name = "PumpkinPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.9, 0.9, 0.9), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 0)}, {MeshId = 18453224, TextureId = 18453205, Name = "PumpkinPi", Scale = Vector3.new(0.35, 0.35, 0.35), Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 0.25), Angle = CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi, 0)}, {MeshId = 125732887, TextureId = 125728597, Name = "PizzaPie", Scale = Vector3.new(0.6, 0.6, 0.6), Size = Vector3.new(1, 0.25, 1), Angle = CFrame.Angles(0, -(math.pi / 2), -(math.pi / 2))} }
BaseUrl = "http://www.roblox.com/asset?id="
function TagHumanoid(Humanoid, Player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Value = Player Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Parent = Humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(Humanoid) if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then for i, v in pairs(Humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end end
function MakeCircle(Diameter, Consistency, Size, Position) local Parts = {} for i = 1, 360, Consistency do local Part = Instance.new("Part") Part.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom Part.Size = Size Part.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth Part.CFrame = CFrame.new(Position) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(i), 0) * CFrame.new(0, 0, Diameter) table.insert(Parts, Part) end return Parts end
function Fire(v, Part)
Part.Velocity = v * 200
local Force = Instance.new("BodyForce") Force.force = Vector3.new(0, (Part:GetMass() * 9.81 * 20), 0) Force.Parent = Part
Debris:AddItem(Part, 5)
Part.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace")
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(function(Mouse) Mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Torso = Character:WaitForChild("Torso") EquipTime = tick() Swing = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.TwoHandSwing) Equip = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.Equip) Hold = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.TwoHandAnim) Hold:Play() Equip:Play(nil, nil, 0.7) Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() if Tool.Enabled and (tick() - EquipTime) > 1.7 then Tool.Enabled = false Mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" Swing:Play() wait(0.75) Swing:Stop() Mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" Tool.Enabled = true end end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) Key = Key:lower() if Key == "q" then if SpecialReady then SpecialReady = false
local TargetPos = Mouse.Hit.p local LookAt = (TargetPos - Handle.Position).unit
local Circle = MakeCircle(3, 60, Vector3.new(1, 1, 1), Torso.Position)
local TorsoClone = Torso:Clone() local TorsoCloneY = TorsoClone:Clone() TorsoCloneY.CFrame = TorsoCloneY.CFrame * CFrame.Angles(math.rad(90), 0, 0)
for i, v in pairs(Circle) do v.CanCollide = false v.Anchored = true v.Parent = Workspace v.CFrame = v.CFrame - TorsoCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * ((Torso.Size.y * 2)) local ChosenPie = Pies[math.random(1, #Pies)] v.Name = ChosenPie.Name v.Size = ChosenPie.Size v.CFrame = v.CFrame * ChosenPie.Angle local Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Mesh.MeshType = Enum.MeshType.FileMesh Mesh.MeshId = BaseUrl .. ChosenPie.MeshId Mesh.TextureId = BaseUrl .. ChosenPie.TextureId Mesh.Scale = ChosenPie.Scale Mesh.Parent = v end
for i = 0.1, ((((Torso.Position.y + (Torso.Size.y / 2)) - Circle[1].Position.y) - 0.1) * 4) do for i, v in pairs(Circle) do v.CFrame = v.CFrame + TorsoCloneY.CFrame.lookVector * 0.25 end wait(0.05) end
for i,v in pairs(Circle) do v.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and Hit.Parent ~= Character then local humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 then TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(15) wait(1) UntagHumanoid(humanoid) end end end) v.Anchored = false Fire(LookAt, v) end
wait(SpecialCoolDown)
SpecialReady = true
end end end) end)
Tool.Unequipped:connect(function() Swing:Stop() Equip:Stop() Hold:Stop() end)
